pageContent: Purpose: Prediction is central to the management of prostate cancer. Nomograms are devices that make predictions. We organized many nomograms for prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Outcomes for patients with extraprostatic prostate cancer treated with trimodality therapy, including brachytherapy, external beam radiotherapy, and hormone therapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21106445/
